name: Ruby Loop Body Butters
description:
Our body butters are made with 100% cold pressed organic coconut oil blended with pure 100% therapeutic grade essential oils.

These are our current blends available for purchase.

Awake
Peppermint and Eucalyptus

Ruby Loop 
Grapefruit and Rosemary

Mind Over Matter
Peppermint, Lavender and Rosemary

Citrus Chiffon
Grapefruit and Lemon

Each are 4 oz 
Currently these are available for pick up at Ruby Loop Spa Parties.
